settings.label: Enable Wishlist
settings.info: After enabling Wishlist you will need to install the free install [ wishlist & compare app](http://wishlist.arenacommerce.com/install)

settings.label: Enable Compare
settings.info: After enabling Compare you will need to install the free install [ wishlist & compare app](http://wishlist.arenacommerce.com/install)

settings.label: Disabled default Ajax Search suggestion
settings.info: Disable Ajax search to integration with Searchanise app. [Register app with 30% discount](http://www.searchanise.com/get/arenacommerce)

settings.label: Searchanise API Key
settings.info: It's use to optimize Speed CSS delivery. [How to get search api key](https://www.arenacommerce.com/blogs/news/how-to-get-searchanise-api-key)

settings.label: Source
settings.info: Multiple Currencies By Shopify only available for stores using Shopify Payments. Please refer to [enabled selling in multiple currencies](https://help.shopify.com//en/manual/payments/shopify-payments/multi-currency/setup)

settings.content: Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. [Click here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Example: CAD USD.

settings.label: Auto Currency Switcher On Customer Location
settings.info: Go to 'Currencies to support' field to add your currencies

settings.content: You can use [Shopify Native Language](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/cross-border/multilingual-online-store) or [Weglot](https://weglot.com/). For best results, we suggest you to use Shopify Native Language.

settings.label: Loading style
settings.info: This only works when Lazy Loading is turned on.

settings.label: Background image
settings.info: The width of image is 1920 pixel.

settings.label: Background color for the number of icons

settings.info: Account icon, search icon, wishlist icon, compare icon, cart icon

settings.label: Link Item Hover Color In Dropdown

settings.content: Product Card use for Homepage Sections & Collection Product Grid.

settings.label: Product title alignment
settings.info: This does not work with Product Style 3

settings.label: Fit collection product images to ratio
settings.info: For best results [all product photos should be the same ratio](https://help.shopify.com/manual/productivity-tools/image-editor#image-aspect-ratio).

settings.label: Use variant images for swatch color
Default Product Template:
settings.info: Select a default template for each product. Alternate templates can also be used for invidual pages. [Learn more](https://help.arenacommerce.com/customization/product.html)

settings.label: Shorten product title in one line

settings.content: Input product [Variants option name](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/variants/add-variants) separate seperate by comma corresponding to the type of swatches
Fomo Popups display real-time customer activity notifications on your store. You can use it as a Social Proof Markteting Tool to Boost Conversions

settings.info: Template: Line 1:'Some one in' {Random City} {Random Text}. Line 2: {Random Products}. Line 3: {Random Number} {Random Text}

options.label: Customer Location Geo IP - Lists of cities by country

settings.label: Manual Cities List
settings.info: To use multiple values please add a separator ;. E.g: New York;London

settings.label: Line 1: Random Text
settings.info: To use multiple values please add a separator ;. E.g: just bought;view

settings.label: Line 2: Random Product in Collection:
settings.info: If no category is selected, it will select randomly from all products

settings.label: Line 3: Random Number
settings.info: To use multiple values please add a separator ;. E.g: 2;3;4;10

settings.label: Line 3: Random Text
settings.info: To use multiple values please add a separator ;. E.g: hours ago;days ago
Only show on Product page. Template: 'Random Number of visitor' {Text Field}

Text Field
settings.default: People are looking this product right now

settings.label: EU Cookie Policy
settings.info: All cookie text could be found on Edit Languages > General > Cookie

settings.label: Enable Catalog Mode
settings.info: WARNING: If this option is enable, it will hide all Add To Cart buttons on your site, making your site a preview site only.

settings.label: Display messages to remind free shipping offer
Enable redirect to checkout after add to cart
settings.info: Enable if you would like to redirect customer to checkout page right after add to cart

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use here, refer to the first checkout page.
